com.artemis.managers

Class WorldSerializationManager.ArtemisSerializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.managers.WorldSerializationManager.ArtemisSerializer<T>
  • Enclosing class:
    WorldSerializationManager

    public abstract static class WorldSerializationManager.ArtemisSerializer<T>
extends Object
    Override this class to actually decide the format in which an object (not necessarily of Artemis type) should be serialized. A JSON serializer is provided, but by overriding this class you may serialize to/from YAML, XML, UDP packets, or even your own JSON format!

    • Method Detail

      • save

        protected final void save(OutputStream out,
                          IntBag entities)
        Convenience method for immediately serializing a group of entities with the default SaveFileFormat. For finer control or SaveFileFormat subclasses, use #save.

      • register

        public abstract WorldSerializationManager.ArtemisSerializer register(Class<?> type,
                                                                     T serializer)
        Register a custom serializer for some known class. It is left to the implementation to decide how this custom serializer is actually used.

      • save

                             SaveFileFormat format)
                      throws SerializationException
